name: Admin Plugins Description
author: Michał Robak

sections.description:
Admin Plugins Description plugin allows you to add your own description, a note about a specific plugin.

This way you don’t have to remember what you used the plugin for or what functionality you use.
You can make a note of the plugin modification information or any other important information about the selected plugin.
sections.installation:
Go to Plugins -> Add New section from your admin account and search for Admin Plugins Description.

You can also install this plugin manually:

  1. Download the plugin’s ZIP archive and unzip it.
  2. Upload unzipped files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: Add custom descriptions to plugins in your admin panel on the plugins page and have more control over your installed plugins.
